casebody.data:
FREEMAN
v.
ROTHROCK, et al. No. 163A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 15, 2008. Jay A. Gervasi, Jr., Greensboro, for Freeman. Joy H. Brewer, Ginny P. Lanier, Cary, for Rothrock, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of December 2008 by NC Asso. of Self-Insurers for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Denied. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of December 2008."
